verbs.description: As [ARG0: former Trump campaign chairman Paul Manafort] [V: spent] [ARG1: a first weekend] [ARGM-LOC: in jail] [ARGM-ADV: pending trial on charges brought by the special counsel investigating Russia 's interference in the 2016 election] , President Donald Trump 's lawyer Rudy Giuliani on Sunday floated the possibility of presidential pardons for Manafort and others charged in the probe .
